# Interface GetSessionConfig

The configuration of getting a session.

interface GetSessionConfig {  
afterTimestamp?: number;  
numRecentEvents?: number;  
}

### `Optional`afterTimestamp

afterTimestamp?: number

Retrieve events after this timestamp.
